object.name: meetingadvicefinances
object.property: <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" i18n:domain="PloneMeeting"> <schema based-on="Products.PloneMeeting.content.advice.IMeetingAdvice"> <field name="advice_category" type="zope.schema.Choice" > <description/> <title i18n:translate="">MeetingCharleroi_label_advice_category</title> <vocabulary>Products.MeetingCharleroi.vocabularies.advicecategoriesvocabulary</vocabulary> <required>False</required> </field> <field name="advice_motivation_categories" type="zope.schema.List" > <description/> <title i18n:translate="">MeetingCharleroi_label_advice_motivation_categories</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.checkbox.CheckBoxWidget"></form:widget> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <vocabulary>Products.MeetingCharleroi.vocabularies.advicemotivationcategoriesvocabulary</vocabulary> </value_type> <required>False</required> </field> </schema> </model>
